create.title: Create New Wallet
create.firstWallet: Create your first wallet to get started
create.newMnemonicDesc: This will create a new wallet with a fresh mnemonic phrase
create.existingMnemonicDesc: This will create an additional wallet using your existing mnemonic phrase
create.selectWalletsDesc: Select one or more wallets to add to your wallet list.
create.multipleWalletsDesc: This will generate multiple wallets with new mnemonics for you to choose from

import.title: Import Existing Wallet
import.mnemonicDesc: This will import or recover your wallet using your backup phrase

remove.title: Remove Wallet
remove.description: Select a wallet to remove from your wallet list.
remove.warning: Warning: This action cannot be undone!
remove.confirmText: Are you sure you want to remove this wallet? Make sure you have backed up your mnemonic phrase if you want to restore it later.

details.noWalletSelected: Please select a wallet to view details

backup.privateKeyWarning: Keep your private key safe! Never share it with anyone:

network.connected: This wallet is connected to the {network}

messages.insufficientFunds: Insufficient funds to complete this transaction

Error.description:
We've unfortunately encountered an error.

You can try to reload the page you were visiting.
Error.title: Something went wrong!

NotFoundPage.description: Please double-check the browser address bar or use the navigation to go to a known page.

source.description: This is an open source project.
source.title: Source code

PathnamesPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).
PathnamesPage.title: Pathnames
